titleStmt.title: The dysclosyng of the canon of ye popysh masse with a sermon annexed vnto it of ye famous clerke of worthy memorye. D Marten Luther.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted haue at al by me Hans hitpricke, [for] W. Copland?,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; publisher's name and publication date from STC.

Caption title on B2r (signed B3) reads: A sermon made bi the famous clerke of worthy memorye, Doctour Marten Luther of the great blasphemy agaynst God whych the Papystes daylie to vse reading thys Antech[r]istian canon yn theyr masse.
Some print faded and show-through; some leaves stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
